remarks: If an integer is divisible by a positive integer, the product of this integer with another integer modulo the positive integer is 0. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Aug-2018.)
statement: mulmoddvds $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ A e. ZZ /\ B e. ZZ ) -> ( N || A -> ( ( A x. B ) mod N ) = 0 ) ) $.
